history.proof: intros plp a la ls H H0. unfold pl_path_incl_length_def in *. intros n H1 H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: pl_path_incl_cons. qsimpl time: 1 use: pl_path_incl_cons. qsimpl time: 1 use: pl_path_incl_cons. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros plp a la ls H H0.

original: intros plp a la ls H H0. unfold pl_path_incl_length_def in *. intros n H1 H2. apply pl_path_incl_cons. - auto. - apply H0 with (n := n). -- auto. -- apply H.
